channel.title: 代码 on 思与制 - A guy's thinking and making

item.title: 生成量子曲线的代码
item.description: c[0, 0, p, q] := 1; c[m, k, p, q] := If[ (k == 0 && m > 0) || k > m, 0, cm - 1, k, p, q c[m - 1, k - 1, p, q]]; A[p, q] := x^q + Sum[ Inverse[Table[Table[c[m, k, p, q], {k, 1, q}], {m, 1, q}]][[q]][[m]] h^(q - m) y^(m - q ) x^m, {m, 1, q - 1}] y^p
